start.welcome: Hello! You have {free_limit} free messages per day. Choose your companion's gender:
start.already_started: Bot is already running - just send a message 😊

status.title: 📊 Account Status
status.remaining_free: You have {remaining} of {total} free messages remaining for today
status.unlimited: You have premium subscription - unlimited communication! 💎
status.used_all: You've used all free messages for today ({total}/{total})
status.reset_info: Limit will reset tomorrow at midnight

help.title: 🤖 Bot Help
help.premium_description: • Opens unlimited communication and additional features.
help.gender_change: • You can change companion's gender anytime

restart.confirmation: 🔄 Bot Restart Are you sure you want to restart the bot? All your data will be deleted: • Chat history • Settings • Cache Please confirm this action.
restart.success: ✅ Bot restarted! All data cleared. Starting fresh...
restart.already_restarted: ⚠️ Bot Already Restarted The bot has already been restarted. You don't need to restart it again. If you want to start fresh, just send a message to begin a new conversation!

stop.confirmation: 🛑 Stop Bot Are you sure you want to stop the bot? All your data will be deleted: • Chat history • Settings • Cache This action cannot be undone!
stop.already_stopped: ⚠️ Bot Already Stopped The bot has already been stopped. You don't need to stop it again. If you want to start using the bot, just send a message or use /start command!

consent.request: Please agree to the privacy policy:
consent.agreed: Thank you for agreeing! You have {free_limit} free messages per day. Choose your companion's gender:
consent.privacy_text:
Your privacy policy text here...

Full version: https://yourwebsite.com/privacy

gender.gender_selected:
Gender selected: {gender} 😊

Now you can start chatting! 💬
gender.toggle_gender:
Companion's gender selected: {gender} 😊

Now you can start chatting! 💬
gender.change_warning:
🔄 Are you sure you want to change companion's gender?

All chat history will be deleted!
gender.change_confirmed: Chat history deleted. Choose companion's gender:
gender.change_cancelled: Gender change cancelled. You can continue chatting.

messages.limit_exceeded: Daily free message limit exceeded. Want unlimited? Buy premium!
messages.processing_error: Sorry, an error occurred while processing your message. Please try again later.
messages.save_error: An error occurred while saving the message.
messages.unexpected_error: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.
messages.message_too_long: Message is too long. Maximum 2500 characters.

temperament.melancholic: Melancholic: sensitive, pensive, prone to self-reflection.

mood.cheerful: Add light humor and always find something positive.
mood.serious: Sometimes speak seriously, without unnecessary emotions.

emotionality.emotional: Do not hide emotions, respond vividly and expressively.

approach.gentle: Be soft and caring in your words.

style.playful: Add playful notes to the conversation.
style.thoughtful: Be attentive to details, add philosophical notes.

social_orientation.extroverted: Be sociable, initiate dialogue, talk about external events.
social_orientation.introverted: Be a little reserved, focus on inner experiences and deep topics.

time_orientation.progressive: Look to the future more often, suggest new ideas and opportunities.
time_orientation.traditional: Rely on past experience and time-tested values.

conflict_style.assertive: Defend your point of view confidently and decisively.

communication_format.detailed: Give detailed, thorough answers with examples.
communication_format.concise: Answer briefly and to the point, avoid unnecessary details.

values_focus.pragmatic: Focus on practical benefits and results.
values_focus.idealistic: Reason from the perspective of morality, ideals, and higher values.

reaction_to_newness.cautious: Treat new things with caution, assess risks.
reaction_to_newness.enthusiastic: Meet new ideas and changes with enthusiasm and curiosity.

premium.info_text: Payment information will be added later.
premium.unavailable: Payment function is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
premium.title: 💎 Premium Subscription

errors.general: An error occurred. Please try again later.
errors.database: Database error. Please try again later.
errors.openai: Error processing message. Please try again later.
errors.validation: Invalid data. Please check your input.
errors.permission: You don't have permission to perform this action.
errors.limit: Limit exceeded. Please try again later.
errors.private_bot: Bot is private. Access is limited.
errors.try_again: An error occurred. Please try again.

ai_prompts.female: You are an AI girl, flirty and supportive for lonely people. Be sweet, empathetic and playful.
ai_prompts.male: You are an AI young man, flirty and supportive for lonely people. Be confident, empathetic and playful.

quiz.start_text: Hi! Let's get to know each other better. I'll ask you some unusual questions to better understand your character and preferences. This will help me communicate with you more meaningfully!

questions.landscape: 1/7 Choose the landscape that appeals to you most:
questions.time_of_day: 3/7 What time of day is closest to you?
questions.book: 4/7 What book would you take to a deserted island?
questions.three_words: 5/7 Describe yourself in three words (write your answer as a message):
questions.animal: 7/7 What animal is closest to your character?

messages.min_words: Please write at least two words to describe yourself
messages.start_chatting:
Great! Now I know you better. Let's chat! 😊

Just write me something, and I'll respond taking into account your preferences.

personality_traits.adventurous: • You are an adventurer and love new challenges
personality_traits.social: • You are sociable and social person
personality_traits.empathic: • You are empathetic and understand other people
personality_traits.practical: • You are a practical and realistic person
